verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing, O barren, sing, thou who didst not bear,
You shall have a song for all men everywhere;
A river of life within is flowing out to say:
Sing, O barren, sing, for this is God's new day.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And a nation shall be born in a day,
A nation shall be born in a day,
When Zion travails she shall bring forth
And a nation shall be born in a day.
